name: SSO with Spring Boot, OIDC & Okta
description: This app demonstrates integrating a simple Spring Boot / Spring Security app with Okta using OIDC. Fill in detail for a user you can log in with after app deploy below. This user will be created in your Okta org.

OKTA_ADMIN_NAME_FIRST.description: First name Okta Admin user created by app.

OKTA_ADMIN_NAME_LAST.description: Last name for Okta Admin user created by app.

OKTA_ADMIN_EMAIL.description: Valid Email Address for Okta Admin user created by app.

OKTA_ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: Password for Okta Admin user created by app. (Should be 8 chars min, with 1 each of cap letter, number and symbol.
